program codeforces_70_B
    implicit none
    integer :: n
    character(len=100000) :: input_str
    integer :: length, max, count = 0, idx = 0
    integer :: i
    integer, allocatable, dimension(:) :: msgLength
    integer :: ans

    ! Read the integer n and the string
    read *, n
    read '(a)', input_str

    length = len_trim(input_str)

    if (length == 0) then
        write(*, '('''',A,''')') 'Impossible'
        stop
    end if

    allocate(msgLength(0:length/2))

    max = -1

    i = 1

    do while (i <= length)
        character(1) :: c
        c = input_str(i:i) if (c == '.' .or. c == '?' .or. c == '!') then
            count = count + 1
            msgLength(idx) = count
            idx = idx + 1
            if (count > max) then
                max = count
            end if
            i = i + 1  ! Skip the character
            count = 0
        else
            count = count + 1
        end if
        i = i + 1  ! Normal loop increment
    end do

    if (max > n) then
        print *, 'Impossible'
    else
        ans = 0 i = 0
        do while (i < idx)
            integer :: current
            current = msgLength(i)
            do while (i < idx - 1 .and. current + msgLength(i+1) + 1 <= n)
                current = current + msgLength(i+1) + 1 i = i + 1
            end do
            ans = ans + 1
            i = i + 1
        end do
        print *, ans
    end if

    deallocate(msgLength)
end program codeforces_70_B

            i = i + 1

    end if

    deallocate(msgLength)
end program codeforces_70_B
